statements.select: select a.I_INTID, a.C_RFIDNO, a.C_CARNAME, to_char(to_date(a.C_CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_CREATETIME, a.C_CREATEUSERNAME, to_char(to_date(a.C_UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_UPDATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSERNAME, a.C_ISUSED from SM_RFID_INFO a where a.C_ISUSED='Y' order by a.I_IntId desc

select a.I_INTID, a.C_RFIDNO, a.C_CARNAME, to_char(to_date(a.C_CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_CREATETIME, a.C_CREATEUSERNAME, to_char(to_date(a.C_UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_UPDATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSERNAME, a.C_ISUSED from SM_RFID_INFO a where a.C_ISUSED='Y' and a.C_CARNAME=#value# order by a.I_IntId desc

select a.I_INTID, a.C_RFIDNO, a.C_CARNAME, to_char(to_date(a.C_CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_CREATETIME, a.C_CREATEUSERNAME, to_char(to_date(a.C_UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_UPDATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSERNAME, a.C_ISUSED from SM_RFID_INFO a where a.C_ISUSED='Y' and a.C_RFIDNO=#value# order by a.I_IntId desc
select a.I_INTID, a.C_RFIDNO, a.C_CARNAME, a.C_ISUSED from SM_RFID_INFO a where a.C_ISUSED='Y' and a.C_RFIDNO=#value#
statements.insert:
select SEQ_SM_RFID_INFO.nextval as IntId from dual
insert into SM_RFID_INFO ( I_INTID, C_RFIDNO, C_CARNAME, C_CREATETIME, C_CREATEUSERNAME, C_UPDATETIME, C_UPDATEUSERNAME, C_ISUSED )values ( #IntId#, #RFIDno#, #Carname#, to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss'), #Createusername#, to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss'), #Updateusername#, #Isused# )
statements.update: update SM_RFID_INFO set C_RFIDNO=#RFIDno#, C_CARNAME=#Carname#, C_UPDATETIME=to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss'), C_UPDATEUSERNAME=#Updateusername#, C_ISUSED=#Isused# where I_IntId = #IntId#
update SM_RFID_INFO set C_ISUSED='N', C_UPDATETIME=to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss'), C_UPDATEUSERNAME=#Updateusername# where I_IntId = #IntId#
